name: Footsteps in the maze
description:
In this game you wake up in an old cellar. You don't know where you are and frighteningly you don't remember who you are. This game is based on real events related by several inhabitants of a small village, some of them never coming back.

    Solve the puzzles and escape from that cellar, but be careful that you are not alone there!

(Depending on how you manage to solve the puzzles, you can have a bad or a good ending).
